content.rendered:
2022 US Open Golf Custom Travel Packages

The US Open is one of golf’s greatest events and in 2022 it will take place at Brookline’s The Country Club, the first course in the Boston area to host a major in 34 years. Our bespoke 2022 US Open Golf travel packages include tickets to your chosen rounds, first-class accommodations, hospitality options and more. The US Open is an incredible tournament and its spectacular host makes 2022 the perfect year to attend. Complete 2022 US Open Golf packages are available now from $4,485 per person (2 rounds) or $8,625 per person (4 rounds).

About the 2022 US Open Golf Tournament

As one of the sport’s four major tournaments, the US Open plays host to the best PGA golfers in the world. In 2022, the tournament will be played June 16-19 at Brookline’s The Country Club, a gorgeous course with a long history dating back to 1882. Known as one of the five founding courses of the USGA, The Country Club’s rich history is equally as impressive as its stunning course design. This prestigious tournament is always a highlight of the summer and 2022 will be no exception.
